summary: Complete end-to-end testing of StartupOps platform. Backend API fully functional with proper security. Frontend loads correctly with all required features including landing page, auth page, pricing page, navigation, theme toggle, and responsive design.
passed_tests: Protected endpoints return 401 for unauthenticated requests
Landing page loads with hero section, features, CTA buttons
Navigation between landing, auth, and pricing pages works
Theme toggle functionality works on all pages
Pricing page displays all 3 plan cards (Free, Pro, Scale)
Auth page shows login/signup tabs with email/password fields
Google OAuth button present and functional
All nav elements have proper data-testid attributes
Responsive design works across desktop and mobile viewports
All CTA buttons are clickable and functional
Form elements are properly labeled and accessible
